Package ie.gmit.sw

Interface Cipherable

All Known Implementing Classes:
Cipher
public interface Cipherable
This interface is used to ensure that the capability of reading in a cyphertext and generating the necessary lists/maps is provided.
Since:
17.0.1
See Also:
  • Cipher

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Map<Character,Integer>
    cypherList(String cypher)
    Generates a Map based on each distinct character within the text and their frequency
    String
    readInFile(String file)
    Used to generate a String based on a specified text file
    ArrayList<Character>
    returnCypherContent()
    Returns a list of all characters from the text

  • Method Details

    • readInFile

      String readInFile(String file)

      Used to generate a String based on a specified text file

      Parameters:
      file - - The name of the text file in which the user entered
      Returns:
      A String value based off the contents of the file

    • cypherList

      Map<Character,Integer> cypherList(String cypher)

      Generates a Map based on each distinct character within the text and their frequency

      Parameters:
      cypher - - The cipher-text entered
      Returns:
      A list containing all the characters within the text

    • returnCypherContent

      ArrayList<Character> returnCypherContent()

      Returns a list of all characters from the text

      Returns:
      An instance of ArrayList based on all the characters within the text.
